name: Gin and Waffles
description:
#GMTK - A platformer without moving the character directly!

How come Ginny can't move you ask? Well, because of a freak accident of course! A freak accident when she was trying out her new jump rope in front of the tv when SUDDENLY!

"FREE WAFFLES UNTIL MIDNIGHT!"

OF COURSE She had to move quickly! She was about to grab her rocket to head over to the waffle bar right away when she suddenly tripped over her jump rope and managed to entangle herself.

In her hurry she also forgot the directions to the waffle bar. So she wrote down the directions on a piece of paper, help her get to the free waffles!

Created by 

Graphics - Tyas van Bergen
Coding - Evelyn Voigt
